name: test_e2e_with_logs[481_CRLF_HDR_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_HDR_001` |
| **Name** | Cookie Header Injection via CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | header_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nSet-Cookie:hacked=true`
